DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective - To investigate pharmacodynamic pharmacokinetic parameter s.c. administration two different dos ( low dose , 0.2 IU/kg high dose , 0.4 IU/kg ) insulin glulisine across healthy subject 4 different BMI-classes ( lean , overweight , moderately obese , severely obese ) , use euglycemic clamp technique Biostatorâ„¢ . Secondary objective - To investigate pharmacodynamic pharmacokinetic property subcutaneous administration insulin glulisine comparison insulin lispro investigate safety tolerability subcutaneous administration insulin glulisine comparison insulin lispro .
DOC.brief_title: Insulin Glulisine Healthy Lean Obese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Normal HbA1c Women either postmenopausal , surgically sterilize , pregnant use adequate contraception . Exclusion criterion : Systemic concomitant medication
